summary: Executes the script in bash, appends its standard output (stdout) to inputs.log and standard error (stderr) to outputs.log simultaneously.

details.comment: Executes the script in bash, appends its standard output (stdout) to inputs.log and standard error (stderr) to outputs.log simultaneously.
details.content:
#tee -a inputs.log | bash | tee -a outputs.log
tee -a inputs.log | bash 2>&1 | tee -a outputs.log
